A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There were some good scenes but the first two hours of the movie is pointless and boring story script. Watch it if your a big fan and all\, but the truth is is that this movie is just too Disney this time. There were some plot holes and questions from The Force Awakens were answered stupidly. And most of all\, HOW DARE YOU DISNEY FOR NOT GIVING LUKE HIS ICONIC GREEN LIGHTSABER BACK!!!
